prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Letter fragment, to Elisha Bliss, Jr., Accession #9125-a, Special Collections Dept., University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: This letter was transferred from the Mark Twain collection on 1990 February 14.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This letter from Anna Elizabeth Dickinson, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania, to Elisha Bliss, Jr., The American Publishing Company, Hartford, Connecticut, concerns a manuscript she hopes to have in order by November, (first page only). 1 p.
